attributes.action: I want the government to enforce the lockdown by using any means necessary
attributes.additional_details: Too many people do not listen to the government with the lockdown in place and too many people are dying
attributes.background: Get the army to assist the police and do check points and close all business except big supermarkets and police the supermarkets

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned about enforcement of Government restrictions but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It would be an operational decision for the police whether to request assistance from the military.

Since you started this petition, some restrictions have been lifted.

If you would prefer these to be extended, you may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319329
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
